page.title: 05CHERRY COTTAGE
page.content: The present owner of Cherry Cottage has lived there for{22 years}and is now retired. The building itself is {200 years old.}The house and garden and garden covers{three-quarters of an {acre.}The only time for a holiday is in the spring. The owners{hobbies}are {gardening,D.I.Y.,caravaning.}The house has{two porches, back and front.}It used to be a{butcher's shop}because of the{small passage-way}along the footpath which goes by the side of the house. In the corner of the garden there is an{allanstone.
